data.title: Matt Bomer onboard Jonah Hill's next directorial Outcome
data.meta_description: Bomer joins a star-studded cast for the film, including Cameron Diaz and Keanu Reeves
data.text:
Matt Bomer has signed up for actor-director Jonah Hill's next film entitled Outcome. Bomer is known for the key roles he played in TV shows such as White Collar, The Sinner, and Fellow Travelers. He is joining a cast that includes the likes of Cameron Diaz, Keanu Reeves, and Hill himself.

Outcome is a production venture of Apple Studios and touted as a dark comedy. Matt Dines, Hill, and Ali Goodwin are producing the film under their banner Ste Baby.

Outcome follows Reeves' Hollywood star character, Reef, who is forced to face his dark past and correct a mistake as he faces extortion after a mysterious video pops up.
